resources.string:
\u2022 Encourage the person to support the injury with their hand or use a cushion or items of clothing to prevent unnecessary movement.\n
\u2022 If the injured area is obviously deformed the broken bone is protruding through the skin, the area below the injury is numb, pale, blue or cold, the injury is significantly painful, or the person cannot be safely transformed to a medical facility, call Emergency service to get someone else to do it.\n \u2022 Make sure the injury is supported until help arrives

• Saicharan Reddy B00826400 sc224515@dal.ca
